```{r setup, include=FALSE}
##DO NOT KNITR THIS FILE
#knitr options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
#packages
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(rmarkdown)
library(staplr) 
```

```{r loopPDF}
##loop fro pdf files
#read the ligns of Rmd files
lines <- readLines("PhotosManquantes.Rmd")
#knitr French / North Atlantic, Channel Sea and North sea
writeLines(purrr::map_chr(1:139, ~ lines[.]), "test1s.Rmd")
render("test1s.Rmd",output_file=paste0("../docs/", "PhotoàPrendreAMM", ".pdf"))
#knitr English / North Atlantic, Channel Sea and North sea
writeLines(purrr::map_chr(c(1:94,141:183), ~ lines[.]), "test2s.Rmd")
render("test2s.Rmd",output_file=paste0("../docs/","PhotototakeAMM", ".pdf"))
#knitr French / Guadeloupe and Martinique
writeLines(purrr::map_chr(c(1:59,185:242), ~ lines[.]), "test3s.Rmd")
render("test3s.Rmd",output_file=paste0("../docs/","PhotoàPrendreGM", ".pdf"))
#remove extra pages that appears
remove_pages(
  rmpages=1,
  input_filepath = "../docs/PhotoàPrendreGM.pdf",
  output_filepath = "../docs/PhotoàPrendreGM.pdf",
)
#knitr English / Guadeloupe and Martinique
writeLines(purrr::map_chr(c(1:59,185:218,244:266), ~ lines[.]), "test4s.Rmd")
render("test4s.Rmd",output_file=paste0("../docs/","PhotototakeGM", ".pdf"))
#remove extra pages that appears
remove_pages(
  rmpages=1,
  input_filepath = "../docs/PhotototakeGM.pdf",
  output_filepath = "../docs/PhotototakeGM.pdf",
)
```
